text: Farissa Evelin Córdoba Martínez (born 30 June 1989) is a Panamanian footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Israeli Ligat Nashim club Maccabi Holon FC and the Panama women's national team. ==International career== Córdoba appeared in two matches for Panama at the 2018 CONCACAF Women's Championship. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football goalkeepers Category:Panamanian women's footballers Category:Sportspeople from Panama City Category:Panama women's international footballers Category:Maccabi Holon F.C. (women) players Category:Panamanian expatriate footballers Category:Panamanian expatriate sportspeople in Ecuador Category:Expatriate women's footballers in Ecuador Category:Panamanian expatriate sportspeople in Israel Category:Expatriate women's footballers in Israel
title: Farissa Córdoba
